short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows user to type r/ <string> into their address bar to navigate to a subreddit!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple extension created so that any user can simply type "r/" followed by the subreddit name into their browser address bar, to navigate to that subreddit.

Just in case:
1) Type "r/" without the quotes.
2) Press space.
3) Type subreddit of choice.
4) Press enter.

I got tired of typing in Reddit (which would autocomplete as reddit.com/r/games), delete the autocompleted subreddit, and then finally type in the subreddit I wanted to go to. 

This way, I can go to any subreddit with minimal effort. 

Hope someone else finds this useful. 

Find me at: https://imranbepari97.github.io/
